title: Four-Headed Dragon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> **Head of Darkness** - Roleblock 3 players, and attack one of them at random.

> **Head of Regret** - Deal a Powerful attack to 2 players.

> **Head of Judgement** - Deal a Powerful attack to 1 player. Gain 2 additional votes the next day that will be attributed to **Head of Judgement**.

> **Head of Revenge** - Deal an Overkill rampage at a player's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You can use different abilities based on who was voted.

> If nobody was executed (either due to nightfall or not reaching majority), use **Head of Darkness**.

> If a good faction member was executed, use **Head of Regret**.

> If a neutral player was executed, use **Head of Judgement**.

> If an evil faction member was executed, use **Head of Revenge**.

> The extra votes from **Head of Judgement** can vote separate from you and separate from each other.
